name: Vase Museum
description:
IMPORTANT: Play game only in fullscreen mode!

A lot of archaeologists sell their finds to my museum, but nowadays there are many scammers who sell fake vases.

Help the museum owner sort it out!

This game was made for BrackeysGamejam 2022

Code, art - ocelotman(https://ocelotman.itch.io/)

Code - oktosha(https://oktosha.itch.io/)

Sound, music desighn - MooggSentry(https://mooggsentry.itch.io/)
